name: DeliveryChannel
description: The AWS::Config::DeliveryChannel resource describes where AWS Config stores configuration changes to an AWS resource.

properties.name: ConfigSnapshotDeliveryProperties
properties.description: Provides options for how AWS Config delivers configuration snapshots to the S3 bucket in your delivery channel.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A name for the delivery channel. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the delivery channel name. For more information, see Name Type.
properties.update: Updates are not supported.. To change the name, you must run two separate updates. Delete this resource in the first update and then recreate it with a new name in the second update.

properties.name: S3BucketName
properties.description: The name of an S3 bucket where you want to store configuration history for the delivery channel.

properties.name: S3KeyPrefix
properties.description: A key prefix (folder) for the specified S3 bucket.

properties.name: SnsTopicARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic that AWS Config delivers notifications to.
